sentences.english: However, it took Zhu Yuanzhang nearly 20 more years to consolidate his hold over the whole country.
sentences.chinese: 此后，他又用近20年的时间，完成了统一大业。

sentences.english: About 100 famous actors worked for nothing on "The Founding of a Republic".

sentences.english: The re-unification of HK promotes the unification of China.

sentences.english: Small wind and cause finally also maintain friends.

sentences.english: Hoo,I heard that the famous Jianguodaye is being shot day and night.

sentences.english: Fresh progress has been made in the great cause of national reunification.
sentences.chinese: 祖国统一大业取得新进展。

sentences.english: Self-confidence is the first requisite to great undertakings.
He begins to question whether there is really any hope in Stannis's cause.
sentences.chinese: 他开始怀疑史坦尼斯王的大业是否还有希望。

sentences.english: The government of Cape Verde abides by the one-China principle and supports China's grand cause of reunification.
sentences.chinese: 佛政府恪守一个中国原则，支持中国统一大业。

sentences.english: And, for the great cause above history would have in turn also choose also.
sentences.chinese: 而青史之上，举大业者亦莫不有择于转折也。

sentences.english: Arab nations would adhere to the one-China policy and support China's peaceful reunification.
sentences.chinese: 阿方坚持一个中国政策，支持中国和平统一大业。

sentences.english: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers .
sentences.chinese: 成就大业著皆是大梦想家。

sentences.english: About 100 famous actors worked for nothing on “The Founding of a Republic”.
sentences.chinese: 在《建国大业》中，约有一百位知名演员无偿出演。
